name: 2025 The 15th International Conference on Key Engineering Materials
content: Proceedings: Submitted papers will be reviewed by 2-3 reviewers. Accepted and presented papers in ICKEM 2025 will be published into Conference Proceedings or Journals, as followings: Note: After passing the TTP review, the article is assigned to the following publications according to the topic: 1.Key Engineering Materials (ISSN: 1662-9795)/Materials Science Forum (ISSN: 1662-9752), Abstracting/Indexing: Scopus, Inspec (IET), CAS, etc. (only for papers related to Material) 2.Solid State Phenomena (ISSN: 1012-0394), Abstracted/Indexed in: SCOPUS, Inspec (IET, Institution of Engineering Technology), Google Scholar, ProQuest, etc. 3.Materials Science Forum (ISSB: 1662-9752), Abstracted/Indexed in: SCOPUS, Inspec (IET, Institution of Engineering Technology), Google Scholar, ProQuest, etc.
